entry.title: SCRIPT_VERIFY_STRICTENC and CHECKSIG NOT
entry.summary: Peter Todd reported a flaw in the Bitcoin protocol on November 6, 2014. He stated that git head is currently accepting an invalid transaction into the mempool, which spends the redeemScript. This could allow double spending attacks and increase the risk of fraud. Meanwhile, bitcoin-ruby's forked once again. Todd's report includes a signature.asc file with a digital signature.
